io.senseai.kelvinsdk

Class KelvinWakefulBroadcastReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • android.support.v4.content.WakefulBroadcastReceiver
        • io.senseai.kelvinsdk.KelvinWakefulBroadcastReceiver

  • public abstract class KelvinWakefulBroadcastReceiver
extends android.support.v4.content.WakefulBroadcastReceiver
    Abstract class that can be extended in order to receive Prediction objects from the SDK as they are produced. The concrete implementation of this class will need to be registered dynamically. Because this class extends WakefulBroadcastReceiver any intensive operations should be offloaded to a Service / worker thread or an IntentService to prevent blocking the UI thread.

      • getIntentFilter

        public android.content.IntentFilter getIntentFilter()
        When dynamically registering the concrete implementation of this class to recieve local broadcasts from the SDK, this method can be called to obtain the IntentFilter needed during dynamic registration.
        Returns:
        An initialized IntentFilter suitable for receiving the proper local broadcasts from the SDK.

      • onPredictionAvailable

        protected abstract void onPredictionAvailable(Prediction prediction)
        This is a callback that facilitates asynchronous communication with the SDK. When the SDK generates a prediction is will send a local broadcast to the concrete implementation of this class that will then call this method with the Prediction object that was just generated as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        Prediction - object generated by the SDK
